title: Client Connectivity??? H
body:
Hello all,
I have been struggling for a week trying to resolve this issue and I cant figure it out. 
The problem: I launch league and login into the client normally, at this point everything is OK. Upon queing up for a match in ANY gamemode the que time is endless and I cannot exit the que. I have to exit the whole client and in order to get the launcher to run correctly I have to restart my comp. 
_Things I have done_
- Re downloaded and installed twice
- Ran tracert with all good pings
- Ran the hextech repair tool
- Disabled firewall
- Updated all drivers 
- Submitted ticket to RIOT

I do believe this has to do with my internet because none of my steam games will connect to matches either. It it weird i have no packet loss. Help?

replies.body:
Thanks for letting me know about your steam games not connecting either, all this info really helps us to narrow down what could be going on here!! 

It really sounds like something is most likely blocking your connections from getting to multiplayer servers or something like that. I've seen this happen a lot when firewalls or antivirus' get a little too excited about doing their job, and we probably just need to adjust their settings really quickly. These steps are a little lengthy, but please make sure to troubleshoot using this guide-> [**Troubleshooting Firewalls**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3).

Hello Broporo,
I have followed the firewall guide and completed each step, unfortunately I am getting the same result. 
- I have turned off the private and public firewall on my PC
- Since its a new build I have not installed a 3rd party firewall/antivirus
- I even turned off my router firewall to gain the same result. 

Do you think that having the wrong network adapters would contribute to this problem? I can surf some websites fine but others will not load. I have posted on steam, tripwire (rising storm 2 forum) and CS GO forums and it seems not alot of people have ideas on whats going on!

I appreciate this time!
